  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball(double x, double y, double width, double height, double speed)
      Constructs a Ball object with specified position, dimensions, and initial speed. The ball is filled and has a black color. The initial velocity is random and can be negative.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the ball's position.
      y - The y-coordinate of the ball's position.
      width - The width of the ball.
      height - The height of the ball.
      speed - The initial speed of the ball.

  • Method Details

    • getVx

      public double getVx()
      Gets the x-component of the ball's velocity.
      Returns:
      The x-component of the velocity.

    • getVy

      public double getVy()
      Gets the y-component of the ball's velocity.
      Returns:
      The y-component of the velocity.

    • setVy

      public void setVy(double vy)
      Sets the y-component of the ball's velocity.
      Parameters:
      vy - The new y-component of the velocity.

    • setVx

      public void setVx(double vx)
      Sets the x-component of the ball's velocity.
      Parameters:
      vx - The new x-component of the velocity.

    • setSpeedBonus

      public void setSpeedBonus(double vx, double vy)
      Sets a speed bonus for the ball, modifying both x and y components of velocity. Also, sets a timer for the duration of the speed bonus.
      Parameters:
      vx - The new x-component of the velocity.
      vy - The new y-component of the velocity.

    • move

      public void move(Breakout program, Health health)
      Handles the movement of the ball based on its velocity and game environment. Checks for collisions with walls and updates the position accordingly. Handles special cases, such as a speed bonus timer.
      Parameters:
      program - The Breakout program instance.
      health - The Health instance representing player's health.
